text:
When I log out as "lenya", I get an error message that lenya is not allowed to
view the page.

On the zones server, a NPE occurs after a considerably long waiting time:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.mozilla.javascript.ScriptRuntime.exitActivationFunction(ScriptRuntime.java:2855)
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
The repo session is now removed from the servlet session, the logout works
correctly in my local installation. I'll leave it open until I can test it on
the zones server.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: Looks good on the zone demo.
